categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Meeshal was a Human Imperial Navy Captain loyal to Darth Krayt and the One Sith. He served under the command of the Darth Stryfe, a Sith Lord who held the title of Fist.
Captain Meeshal aided Lord Stryfe when the latter was sent by Emperor Krayt to search for remnants of the New Jedi Order on Ossus and destroy them.
Meeshal's appearance and name are based on Mish'al Samman, the real life "Commanding Officer" of the Saudi Arabian Outpost of the real-world 501st Legion.
